article: Mary is four years old . She likes to ask questions . Her questions are often funny . One day Mary goes to see her uncle with her father . Her uncle lives in _ city . The city is n ' t near their city , so they take a bus to go there . After many hours , they get to Mary ' s uncle ' s city . He is very happy to see them . The next morning , Mary ' s uncle takes her and her father out and shows them around . " Look at that big house , " says her uncle . " It ' s the oldest house in the city . " " How old is it ? " her father asks . " It is about 2100 years old , " her uncle answers . " How can that be ? " Mary says . " It ' s only 2015 this year ! " , .
questions: What do Mary and her father go to do ?
